analyzed: dukkha upanītaḥ api naraḥ sa pañño

original: Bahū hi phassā ahitā hitā ca,
analyzed: bahū hi phassāḥ ahitā hitā ca
kim tvam nu tattha iva tadā
na ca iva aham tattha tadā

original: Na cāpi me koci naṁ etadakkhā;

analyzed: sa putta dāraḥ nara vīra seṭṭha
puttā ca dārā ca sahāya saṅghā

original: Na tveva hañño mama pāṇado yo.
analyzed: na tu eva haññaḥ mama pāṇadaḥ
atha ruru mi gena paraḥ sarabhaḥ ti
